messages.content: ComfyUI Node Beautify is an extension for ComfyUI that helps format the workflow by rounding the size and position of each node and group.
What feature does ComfyUI Node Beautify add to ComfyUI?
ComfyUI Node Beautify adds a 'Beautify' button to the menu in ComfyUI.
How does the 'Beautify' button work in ComfyUI Node Beautify?
When clicked, the 'Beautify' button rounds the size and position of each node and group in a workflow using a specified value.
How can you adjust the rounding value in ComfyUI Node Beautify?
You can adjust the rounding value by clicking the cog icon to open settings and editing the 'Beautify Grid Size' field.
What does the 'Beautify Grid Size' field in the settings of ComfyUI Node Beautify do?
The 'Beautify Grid Size' field allows you to change the value used for rounding the size and position of nodes and groups.
Is ComfyUI Node Beautify a standalone application?
No, ComfyUI Node Beautify is an extension for ComfyUI, not a standalone application.
Does ComfyUI Node Beautify affect the functionality of the nodes and groups in a workflow?
No, ComfyUI Node Beautify only affects the size and position of nodes and groups, not their functionality.
